cause.description:
Dare2 is a youth development charity working with marginalised young people in UK, creating opportunities for personal, social and spiritual development. “Our mission is to be at the heart of a professional community that offers experiential learning to marginalised young people enabling them to make the best life choices and fulfil their potential.” We are committed to a partnership model in working with young people. That means we work with community youth organisations and schools rather, than the young people themselves. In the same way as personal growth needs to be nurtured and developed over an extended period if it is to be of real value to the individual and the community, so we prefer to work in long term partnerships.
1. More accurate self-perception gained through living and working together
2. Greater commitment to achieve potential in life.
3. Broadened horizons gained through new experience
4. Greater understanding of personal potential
cause.mission: Enable marginalised young people to fulfill thier potential.
cause.name: Dare2
